Package org.waltonrobotics.controller

Class MotionLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waltonrobotics.controller.MotionLogger
  • public class MotionLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to log MotionData during autonomous
    Author:
    Russell Newton, WaltonRobotics

    • Field Summary

      private java.lang.String filePath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MotionLogger()
      Create this in robotInit() before making the drivetrain Uses the default "/home/lvuser/" location on the roboRIO to save the logs

      Create this in robotInit() before making the drivetrain

    • Constructor Detail

      • MotionLogger

        public MotionLogger​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Create this in robotInit() before making the drivetrain
        Parameters:
        filePath - - Where do you want to save the logs? To save to the roboRIO, use base directory "/home/lvuser/". To save to a thumb drive, use winSCP or similar program to find the right filepath

      • MotionLogger

        public MotionLogger()
        Create this in robotInit() before making the drivetrain Uses the default "/home/lvuser/" location on the roboRIO to save the logs

    • Method Detail

      • addMotionData

        public final void addMotionData​(MotionData dataAdd)
        This is called in the MotionController to add MotionData to the motionDataList that MotionLogger has

      • initialize

        public final void initialize()
        Call this in autonomousInit() to clear the motionDataList

      • writeMotionDataCSV

        public final void writeMotionDataCSV()

      • writeMotionDataCSV

        public final void writeMotionDataCSV​(boolean clearData)
        Saves data to a .csv file with the name in "yyyy-MM-dd hh-mm-ss" format. Call this in disabledInit() to send the motionDataList to a .csv file.

      • getErrorVectorList

        public java.util.AbstractList<ErrorVector> getErrorVectorList​(int pathNumber)
